title: Ep 196: Tejo, Portugal with Ian Renwick
itunes:title: Tejo, Portugal with Ian Renwick
description:
Ian Renwick, owner of Jaded Palates wine in the UK and occasional co-host returns to talk about a recent trip to Tejo, Portugal. It's a fascinating region experiencing a renaissance and we give you the inside line on the best wines to seek out!

 

 

 

Special thanks to this week's sponsor, The Great Courses Plus! Check out my special URL to get a free month of access to amazing video lectures: thegreatcoursesplus.com/wine
